short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book pre-purchase car inspection. Go to your favorite used car website, and see if InspectWise has near by inspectors available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want detailed information about the used car you are interested in?
InspectWise provides car inspections, which will give you information about the actual condition and details of the car.
Our Chrome extension will let you see if we have inspectors near by the car you are interested in.

This is how you use our extension:
1. Go to your favorite used car website (e.g. mobile.de or autoscout24.com).
2. Find a car that interests you.
3. Open InspectWise Chrome extension and search with the address mentioned in the ad.
4. If inspectors are available you can proceed to book an inspection.
